original_text:
See what they spew from their mouths—
    the words from their lips are sharp as swords,
    and they think, “Who can hear us?”
korean_text: 그들의 입으로는 악을 토하며 그들의 입술에는 칼이 있어 이르기를 누가 들으리요 하나이다

sentences.original_text: See what they spew from their mouths—
the words from their lips are sharp as swords,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 입술에서 나오는 말은 칼처럼 날카롭고
